p: In China, stem cells are currently being studied as a treatment for nCOVID-19. Tocilizumab (a mAb) is an immunosuppressive agent and is used to treat rheumatoid arthritis (Kaneko, 2013). This agent was designed to suppress the IL-6 binding with its receptors to alleviate cytokine storm syndrome. Tocilizumab is now being studied as a potential nCOVID-19 treatment (Jean et al., 2020b; Slater, 2020).
